1. A runaway British aristocrat and convicted rapist were found guilty over their baby’s death. Here’s how their story unfolded  CNN
  2. ‘A relentless, destructive energy’: inside the trial of Constance Marten and Mark Gordon  The Guardian
  3. Woman With Connection to British Royalty and Her Partner Convicted in Baby's Death  People.com
  4. British aristocrat Constance Marten and her partner Mark Gordon found guilty over baby daughter's death  CBS News
  5. I've never seen a case like Constance Marten and Mark Gordon's - it was jaw-dropping  BBC
